attributes.action: Strip South Eastern trains of its license
attributes.additional_details: Review their readily available statistics. I can provide numerous references from other long suffering customers
attributes.background: Totally unreliable and atrocious service which has been like this for several years and getting worse. Long suffering passengers cannot rely on this company to run an even basic service to get them to work on time or be at destinations in their leisure time, despite paying exorbitant ticket prices.
